endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

param_schema.description: Width of output image. Reduce the seeting if hits memory limits

param_schema.description: Height of output image. Reduce the seeting if hits memory limits

parameters.default: A alien cheeseburger creature eating itself, claymation, cinematic, moody lighting

param_schema.title: Strength
param_schema.description: indicates how much to transform the input iamge, valid for text_guided_img2img task.
